sqlMap.select:
select * from (select rownum rownum_ , AA.* from ( select a.headid as "headid", a.billno as "billno", a.move_type as "moveType", a.dodate as "dodate", a.src_bill_code as "srcBillCode", a.src_bill_no as "srcBillNo", a.src_bill_id as "srcBillId", a.estimate_id as "estimateId", a.red_estimate_id as "redEstimateId", a.estimate_no as "estimateNo", a.red_estimate_no as "redEstimateNo", a.out_org_id as "outOrgId", a.in_org_id as "inOrgId", a.out_stock_id as "outStockId", a.in_stock_id as "inStockId", a.out_group as "outGroup", a.in_group as "inGroup", a.sum_count as "sumCount", a.sum_weight as "sumWeight", a.rececount as "receCount", a.norececount as "noreceCount", a.cert_count as "certCount", a.pack_no as "packNo", a.create_id as "createId", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_id as "updateId", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.receive_date as "receiveDate", a.receive_emp_id as "receiveEmpId", a.status as "status", nvl(a.back_in48_flag, '0') as "backIn48Flag", a.license_complete_flag as "licenseCompleteFlag" from jat_move_head a where a.bill_type = #billType# and a.jm_flag = #jmFlag# and ((a.in_org_id = #orgId# and (a.status in (5, 25, 26, 17, 14, 7, 8))) or exists(select 1 from jas_bd_emp_org b where b.orgid = a.out_org_id and b.empid = #userId#) a.out_org_id = #orgId#) and a.status <> 8 and a.status <> 7
order by a.BILLNO desc ) AA ) where rownum_ >= $start$ and rownum <= $limit$

select count(1) from jat_move_head a where a.bill_type = #billType# and a.jm_flag = #jmFlag# and ((a.in_org_id = #orgId# and (a.status in (5, 25, 26, 17, 14, 7, 8))) or exists(select 1 from jas_bd_emp_org b where b.orgid = a.out_org_id and b.empid = #userId#) a.out_org_id = #orgId#) and a.status <> 8 and a.status <> 7

select bb.orna_code as "ornaCode", bb.orna_barcode as "barCode", bb.orna_dsc as "ornaDsc", bb.item_class_id as "itemClassId", bb.orna_class_id as "ornaClassId", bb.alaysis_id as "analysisId", bb.summarydescription as "analysisName", bb.style_id as "styleId", bb.stylename as "styleName", bb.isbiggraph as "bigGraph", bb.sale_unit_id as "unitId", bb.all_qty as "allWeight", bb.now_qty as "nowQty", bb.stone_now_num as "grains", bb.pos_amount as "posAmount", bb.real_total_cost as "posCost",
case when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 0 then bb.real_total_cost when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 1 then bb.real_total_cost * bb.coef when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 2 then bb.pos_amount * bb.coef when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 3 then (bb.real_unit_cost + bb.coef) * bb.now_qty end as "newPosCost",
bb.pos_amount as "newPosCost",
decode(bb.is_lock, 1,
(case when nvl((select cc.org_type from jat_pl_basic_special_diam_org cc where cc.org_id = #inOrgId#), 1) = 1 then bb.basic_price else nvl((select dd.store_price from jat_pl_basic_special_diam dd where dd.item_class_id = bb.item_class_id and dd.orna_class_id = bb.orna_class_id and dd.analysis_id = bb.alaysis_id and dd.start_basic_price <= bb.basic_price and dd.end_basic_price >= bb.basic_price), bb.basic_price) end),
bb.pos_amount,
case when to_char(round(bb.basic_price * bb.salepricecoef)) like '%4' then round(bb.basic_price * bb.salepricecoef) + 1 else round(bb.basic_price * bb.salepricecoef) end) as "newPosMoney", bb.main_weight as "mainWeight", bb.part_weight as "partWeight", bb.state as "status", decode(bb.is_dbl_label, '1', '1', '0') as "isDblLabel", bb.org_id as "orgId", bb.stock_id as "stockId", bb.groups as "outGroupNo", to_char(to_date(bb.toshopdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') + 2, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "toshopdateAfter48" from (select a.orna_code, a.orna_barcode, a.orna_dsc, a.item_class_id, a.orna_class_id, a.alaysis_id, c.summarydescription, a.style_id, b.stylename, b.isbiggraph, a.sale_unit_id, a.all_qty, a.now_qty, a.stone_now_num, a.real_unit_cost, a.real_total_cost, a.basic_price, a.pos_amount, a.is_lock, a.main_weight, a.part_weight, a.org_id, a.stock_id, a.state, a.groups, a.is_dbl_label, a.toshopdate,
(select nvl(max(d.move_coef), 1) from jat_move_salecoef_head c, jat_move_salecoef_line d where c.headid = d.headid and c.in_org_id = #inOrgId# and c.item_class_id = a.item_class_id and c.orna_class_id = a.orna_class_id and (instr(',' || c.style_item_ids || ',', ',' || b.styleitemclass || ',') > 0 or c.style_item_ids is null) and d.mainwt_str <= a.main_weight and a.main_weight < d.mainwt_end) as salepricecoef, d.coef_way, d.coef from ic_mater_active a left join jat_move_costcoef d on a.item_class_id = d.item_class_id and a.orna_class_id = d.orna_class_id
1 as salepriceCoef, 0 as coef_way, 1 as coef from ic_mater_active a
left join jas_bd_style b on a.style_id = b.styleid left join jas_bd_analysis_arange c on a.alaysis_id = c.analysis_arange_id where a.orna_code = #code# a.orna_barcode = #code#) bb
select a.orna_code from ic_mater_active a where a.state <> 900 and a.orna_code in ($value$)
sqlMap.insert:
select jat_move_head_seq.nextval as "headid" from dual
insert into jat_move_head(headid, billno, src_bill_code, src_bill_id, src_bill_no, dodate, out_org_id, in_org_id, out_stock_id, in_stock_id, out_group, in_group, move_type, memo, create_date, create_id, update_date, update_id, status, bill_type, back_in48_flag, jm_flag, license_complete_flag) values(#headid#, #billno#, #srcBillCode#, #srcBillId#, #srcBillNo#, #dodate#, #outOrgId#, #inOrgId#, #outStockId#, #inStockId#, #outGroup#, #inGroup#, #moveType#, #memo#, #createDate#, #createId#, #updateDate#, #updateId#, #status#, #billType#, #backIn48Flag#, #jmFlag#, #licenseCompleteFlag#)
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a set a.dodate = #dodate#, a.memo = #memo#, a.update_date = #updateDate#, a.update_id = #updateId#, a.status = #status# , a.src_bill_code = #srcBillCode# , a.src_bill_id = #srcBillId# , a.src_bill_no = #srcBillNo# where a.headid = #headid#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into jat_move_line(lineid, headid, orna_code, bar_code, orna_dsc, item_class_id, orna_class_id, style_item_class, style_middle_class, style_orna_class, style_id, analysis_id, unit_id, now_qty, all_weight, grains, main_weight, part_weight, is_muti_part, is_dbl_label, pos_cost, pos_amount, is_psale, out_group_no, saleprice_coef, cost_coef_way, costprice_coef, in_group_no, rece_date, rece_emp_id, memo, create_date, create_id, update_date, update_id, status, new_pos_cost, new_pos_money, hrd_cert, gia_cert, igi_cert, ags_cert, ident_id, free_return_flag, free_left_days) select jat_move_line_seq.nextval, #headid#, bb.orna_code, bb.orna_barcode, bb.orna_dsc, bb.item_class_id, bb.orna_class_id, bb.styleitemclass, bb.stylemiddleclass, bb.styleornaclass, bb.style_id, bb.alaysis_id, bb.sale_unit_id, bb.now_qty, bb.all_qty, bb.stone_now_num, bb.main_weight, bb.part_weight, bb.is_muti_part, bb.is_dbl_label, bb.real_total_cost, bb.pos_amount, bb.is_consign, bb.groups, bb.salepriceCoef, bb.coef_way, bb.coef, null, null, null, null, #date#, #userid#, #date#, #userid#, 1, case when nvl(bb.coef_way,0)=0 then bb.real_total_cost when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 1 then bb.real_total_cost * bb.coef when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 2 then bb.pos_amount * bb.coef when nvl(bb.coef_way, 0) = 3 then (bb.real_unit_cost + bb.coef) * bb.now_qty end as new_pos_cost, decode(bb.is_lock, 1,
(case when nvl((select cc.org_type from jat_pl_basic_special_diam_org cc where cc.org_id = #inOrgId#), 1) = 1 then bb.basic_price else nvl((select dd.store_price from jat_pl_basic_special_diam dd where dd.item_class_id = bb.item_class_id and dd.orna_class_id = bb.orna_class_id and dd.analysis_id = bb.alaysis_id and dd.start_basic_price <= bb.basic_price and dd.end_basic_price >= bb.basic_price), bb.basic_price) end),
bb.pos_amount,
case when to_char(round(bb.basic_price * bb.salepricecoef)) like '%4' then round(bb.basic_price * bb.salepricecoef) + 1 else round(bb.basic_price * bb.salepricecoef) end) as new_pos_money, bb.hrd_cert, bb.gia_cert, bb.igi_cert, bb.ags_cert, bb.ident_id, #freeReturnFlag#, #freeLeftDays# from ( select a.orna_code, a.orna_barcode, a.orna_dsc, a.item_class_id, a.orna_class_id, b.styleitemclass, b.stylemiddleclass, b.styleornaclass, a.style_id, a.alaysis_id, a.sale_unit_id, a.now_qty, a.all_qty, a.stone_now_num, a.main_weight, a.part_weight, a.is_muti_part, a.is_dbl_label, a.real_total_cost, a.basic_price, a.pos_amount, a.is_consign, a.groups, a.is_lock, a.hrd_cert, a.gia_cert, a.igi_cert, a.ags_cert, a.ident_id,
(select nvl(max(d.move_coef), 1) from jat_move_salecoef_head c, jat_move_salecoef_line d where c.headid = d.headid and c.in_org_id = #inOrgId# and c.item_class_id = a.item_class_id and c.orna_class_id = a.orna_class_id and (instr(',' || c.style_item_ids || ',', ',' || b.styleitemclass || ',') > 0 or c.style_item_ids is null) and d.mainwt_str <= a.main_weight and a.main_weight < d.mainwt_end) as salepriceCoef, c.coef_way, c.coef, a.real_unit_cost from ic_mater_active a left join jas_bd_style b on a.style_id = b.styleid left join jat_move_costcoef c on a.item_class_id = c.item_class_id and a.orna_class_id = c.orna_class_id
1 as salepriceCoef, 0 as coef_way, 1 as coef, a.real_unit_cost from ic_mater_active a left join jas_bd_style b on a.style_id = b.styleid
where a.orna_code = #ornaCode# ) bb
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a set (a.sum_count, a.sum_weight, a.sum_grains, a.sum_cost, a.sum_money, a.sum_new_pos_cost, a.cert_count) = ( select count(1), nvl(sum(b.all_weight),0), nvl(sum(b.grains),0) , nvl(sum(b.pos_cost),0), nvl(sum(b.pos_amount),0), nvl(sum(b.new_pos_cost),0), sum(nvl2(b.hrd_cert, 1, 0) + nvl2(b.gia_cert, 1, 0) + nvl2(b.igi_cert, 1, 0) + nvl2(b.ags_cert, 1, 0) + nvl2(b.ident_id, 1, 0)) from jat_move_line b where a.headid = b.headid ), a.update_date = #date#, a.update_id = #userid# where a.headid = #headid#
sqlMap.delete: delete jat_move_line a where a.orna_code = #ornaCode# and a.headid = #headid#
sqlMap.select: select a.lineid as "lineid", a.orna_code as "ornaCode", a.bar_code as "barCode", a.orna_dsc as "ornaDsc", a.item_class_id as "itemClassId", a.orna_class_id as "ornaClassId", a.analysis_id as "analysisId", b.summarydescription as "analysisName", a.style_id as "styleId", c.stylename as "styleName", c.isbiggraph as "bigGraph", a.unit_id as "unitId", a.all_weight as "allWeight", a.now_qty as "nowQty", a.grains as "grains", a.pos_amount as "posAmount", a.pos_cost as "posCost", a.new_pos_cost as "newPosCost", a.new_pos_money as "newPosMoney", a.main_weight as "mainWeight", a.part_weight as "partWeight", a.status as "status", decode(a.is_dbl_label, 1, '1', '0') as "isDblLabel", decode(a.pos_amount, a.new_pos_money, '0', '1') as "printLabel", a.free_return_flag as "freeReturnFlag", a.free_left_days as "freeLeftDays", substr(a.create_date, 1, 10) as "createDate" from jat_move_line a left join jas_bd_analysis_arange b on b.analysis_arange_id = a.analysis_id left join jas_bd_style c on c.styleid = a.style_id where a.headid = #headid# and nvl(a.is_dbl_label, 0) = 0 and nvl(a.is_dbl_label, 0) = 1 and nvl(a.is_dbl_label, 0) = 1 order by a.item_class_id, a.orna_class_id, a.style_id, a.orna_dsc

select w.*, (w."sumCount" - w."receCount" - w."discardCount") as "noreceCount" from (select a.headid as "headid", a.billno as "billno", a.src_bill_code as "srcBillCode", a.dodate as "dodate", a.create_id as "createId", a.status as "status", a.out_org_id as "outOrgId", a.in_org_id as "inOrgId", a.out_stock_id as "outStockId", a.in_stock_id as "inStockId", a.out_group as "outGroup", a.in_group as "inGroup", a.sum_count as "sumCount", a.sum_weight as "sumWeight", a.sum_grains as "sumGrains", a.sum_cost as "sumCost", a.sum_money as "sumMoney", a.sum_new_pos_cost as "sumNewPosCost", a.receive_date as "receiveDate", a.receive_emp_id as "receiveEmpId", a.memo as "memo", a.bill_type as "billType", a.src_bill_id as "srcBillId", a.src_bill_no as "srcBillNo", (select count(1) from jat_move_line b where b.headid = a.headid and b.status in (10, 11)) as "receCount", (select count(1) from jat_move_line b where b.headid = a.headid and b.status = 13) as "discardCount", nvl(a.back_in48_flag, '0') as "backIn48Flag", a.label_apply_flag as "labelApplyFlag", a.jm_flag as "jmFlag", a.license_complete_flag as "licenseCompleteFlag" from jat_move_head a where a.headid = #value# )w
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a set a.status = #status#, a.update_date = #updateDate#, a.update_id = #updateId# , a.create_date = #createDate# where a.headid = #headid#
update jat_move_head a set a.status = #status#, a.update_date = #date#, a.update_id = #userid# where a.headid = #headid#

update jat_move_head a set a.receive_date = #date#, a.receive_emp_id = #userid#, a.status = #status# where exists(select 1 from jat_move_pack_line b where b.headid = #packHeadId# and b.bill_id = a.headid)
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from jat_move_net a where a.out_org_id = #outOrgId# and a.in_org_id = #inOrgId# and a.status = 1
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a set a.receive_date = #date#, a.receive_emp_id = #userid#, a.status = #status# where a.headid = #headid#
update jat_move_line a set a.status = #status# where a.headid = #headid# and a.status = 1

update jat_move_head a set a.status = (select case when count(1) > 0 then 7 else decode(a.jm_flag, 1, (decode(a.bill_type, 1, 8, 26)), 8) end from jat_move_line b where b.headid = a.headid and b.status <> 11) , a.update_date = #date#, a.update_id = #userid# where a.headid = #headid#

update jat_pl_dispatch_orna_log a set a.status = 4, a.update_id = #userid#, a.update_date = #date# where a.status = 3 and exists (select 1 from jat_move_head b, jat_move_line c where b.headid = c.headid and b.src_bill_code = a.src_bill_code and b.src_bill_id = a.gather_head_id and c.orna_code = a.orna_code and b.move_type = 2 and b.headid = #headid#)
sqlMap.select: select a.item_class_id as "itemClassId", a.orna_class_id as "ornaClassId", a.unit_id as "unitId", sum(1) as "sumCount", sum(a.all_weight) as "sumWeight", sum(a.pos_cost) as "sumCost" from jat_move_line a where a.headid = #value# group by a.item_class_id, a.orna_class_id, a.unit_id order by a.item_class_id, a.orna_class_id, a.unit_id

select a.orna_code, a.orna_barcode, a.orna_dsc, a.stock_id, a.groups, a.style_id, a.now_qty, a.all_qty, a.item_class_id, a.orna_class_id, a.alaysis_id, a.style_no_id, a.quality_id, a.tag_type, a.sale_unit_id, a.buy_unit_id, a.pric_unit_id, a.price_attr_group, a.state, a.basic_price, a.rebate, a.rebate_type, a.store_unit_cost, a.real_unit_cost, b.new_pos_money as pos_amount, a.real_total_cost, a.store_total_cost, a.productdate, a.old_responsible, a.store_color, a.com_store, a.storagedate, a.toshopdate, a.nuclear_bill_id, a.main_shape_id, a.color_id, a.main_weight, a.part_weight, a.part_content, a.clean_id, a.main_color_grade_id, a.qlty_id, a.stone_total_num, a.stone_now_num, a.special_work_price, a.string_work_price, a.summary_id, a.is_consign, a.is_custom, a.handover_bill_id, a.manufacturer_id, a.supplier_id, a.zodiac, a.ident_id as ident_id, a.factory_style_id, a.storage_pric_attr_group, a.rebate_amount, a.special_weight, a.cut_id, a.cut_wide_scale, a.cut_deep_scale, a.symmetry_id, a.polishine_id, a.fluorescence_id, a.waistline_id, a.vertex_id, a.hrd_cert, a.gia_cert, a.igi_cert, a.bracketcolor_id, a.updatedate, a.wear_id, a.style_type_id, a.is_muti_part, a.currency_price, a.currency_money, a.currency_tax, a.tax, a.total_currency_tax, a.size_id, a.main_num, a.part_num, a.material_id, a.org_id, a.use_qty_temp, a.ags_cert, a.real_cost, a.customize_no, a.is_dbl_label, a.bill_code, a.bill_no, a.is_material, a.material_type, a.color_grade_grade_id, a.clean_grade_id from ic_mater_active a, jat_move_line b where a.orna_code = b.orna_code and b.headid = #headid# and b.orna_code = #ornaCode#
sqlMap.update: update jat_move_head a set (a.rececount, a.norececount) = (select sum(decode(g.status, 10, 1, 11, 1, 0)) as rececount, a.sum_count - sum(decode(g.status, 10, 1, 11, 1, 0)) - sum(decode(g.status, 13, 1, 0)) as discardcount from jat_move_line g where g.headid = a.headid), a.update_date = #updateDate#, a.update_id = #updateId# where a.headid = #headid# exists(select 1 from jat_move_line b where a.headid = b.headid and b.lineid = #lineid#)
sqlMap.select: select a.free_left_days from jms_move_return_left_days a where a.orna_code = #value#
